purpose: To simplify the process of using and comparing different agent frameworks through a single interface
principle: Utilizes a modular architecture to integrate various agent frameworks, allowing for seamless switching and evaluation
reusability: Offers a plug-and-play interface for agent frameworks, making it easy to add new frameworks and switch between them
limitations: Limited to supported agent frameworks; may require additional configuration for unsupported frameworks
name: any-agent
description: A single interface to use and evaluate different agent frameworks
highlight: Provides a unified interface to interact with and evaluate multiple agent frameworks
